snippet: The National Football League will begin testing for human growth hormone on Monday, nearly three weeks after the league and its players agreed to a revised drug policy, the league’s website said.
abstract: National Football League will begin testing for human growth hormone, nearly three weeks after the league and its players agreed to a revised drug policy.
lead_paragraph: The National Football League will begin testing for human growth hormone on Monday, nearly three weeks after the league and its players agreed to a revised drug policy, the league’s website said.

headline.main: N.F.L. to Begin H.G.H. Testing on Monday
